EmailTemplate.name: RS CAROLINAS Partner - Please Fill out Disbursal Form 3
EmailTemplate.subject: Please complete {!Opportunity.Name}'s Confirmation of Interconnection
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Dear {!Opportunity.Partner_tag_lookup__c},
Thank you for partnering with BlueWave for {!Opportunity.Name}'s Solar Loan .
Please remember that in order to receive the additional disbursements, you will need to upload a confirmation of interconnection. Once the system has been interconnected to the grid, these documents can be uploaded here.
It is extremely important that you fill out this webform immediately to ensure your customer is billed fairly. Please feel free to contact us with any concerns or questions.
Sincerely, BlueWave Customer Care customercare@bluewavesolar.com (844) 786 - 4100
